description: Provides pan-European CORINE Land Cover inventory for 44 thematic classes for the 2012 reference year. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 25 hectares (ha) for areal phenomena and a Minimum Mapping Width (MMW) of 100 m for linear phenomena and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover 2012 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides pan-European CORINE Land Cover inventory for for 44 thematic classes the 2006 reference year. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 25 hectares (ha) for areal phenomena and a Minimum Mapping Width (MMW) of 100 m for linear phenomena and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover 2006 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides pan-European CORINE Land Cover inventory for 44 thematic classes for the 1990 reference year. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 25 hectares (ha) for areal phenomena and a Minimum Mapping Width (MMW) of 100 m for linear phenomena and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover 1990 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides pan-European CORINE Land Cover inventory for 44 thematic classes for the 2000 reference year. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 25 hectares (ha) for areal phenomena and a Minimum Mapping Width (MMW) of 100 m for linear phenomena and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover 2000 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides pan-European CORINE Land Cover inventory for 44 thematic classes for the 2018 reference year. The dataset  has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 25 hectares (ha) for areal phenomena and a Minimum Mapping Width (MMW) of 100 m for linear phenomena and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover 2018 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides land cover change information between the 2006 and 2012 CLC status layers. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 5 hectares (ha) and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover Change 2000-2006 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides land cover change information between the 2012 and 2018 CLC status layers. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 5 hectares (ha) and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover Change 2012-2018 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides land cover change information between the 1990 and 2000 CLC status layers. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 5 hectares (ha) and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover Change 1990-2000 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides land cover change information between the 2006 and 2012 CLC status layers. The dataset has a Minimum Mapping Unit (MMU) of 5 hectares (ha) and is available as vector and as 100 m raster data.
title: CORINE Land Cover Change 2006-2012 (vector/raster 100 m), Europe, 6-yearly

description: Provides a pan-European spatially consistent and seamless, detailed land cover inventory for the 2018 reference year, for each polygon showing the dominant land cover among the 18 basic land cover classes and additional attributes. The minimum mapping unit of the dataset is 0.5 ha.
title: CLCplus Backbone 2018 (vector), Europe

description: Provides a pan-European spatially consistent and seamless, detailed land cover inventory for the 2018 reference year, for each pixel showing the dominant land cover among the 11 basic land cover classes. The dataset is available as 10 m raster.
title: CLCplus Backbone 2018 (raster 10 m), Europe, 3-yearly

description: Provides a pan-European spatially consistent and seamless, detailed land cover inventory for the 2021 reference year, for each pixel showing the dominant land cover among the 11 basic land cover classes. The dataset is available as 10 m raster.
title: CLCplus Backbone 2021 (raster 10 m), Europe, 3-yearly

description: Provides a pan-European spatially consistent and seamless, detailed land cover inventory for the 2023 reference year, for each pixel showing the dominant land cover among the 11 basic land cover classes. The dataset is available as 10 m raster.
title: CLCplus Backbone 2023 (raster 10 m), Europe, 2-yearly

description: Provides auxiliary information in the spatial resolution of 10 m on the trees in agricultural use and urban context, used for production of the Forest Type dataset for the 2018 reference year. Data is sourced from Corine Land Cover and High Resolution Layer Imperviousness.
title: Forest Additional Support Layer 2018 (raster 10 m), Europe, 3-yearly

description: Provides auxiliary information in the spatial resolution of 10 m on the trees in agricultural use and urban context, used for production of the Forest Type dataset for the 2021 reference year. Data is sourced from Corine Land Cover and High Resolution Layer Imperviousness.
title: Forest Additional Support Layer 2021 (raster 10 m), Europe, 3-yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 20 m and 100 m a forest classification with three thematic classes (all non-forest areas / broadleaved forest / coniferous forest) for the 2015 reference year. In the 100 m spatial resolution the dataset has the agricultural/urban trees removed.
title: Forest Type 2015 (raster 20 m and 100 m), Europe, 3-yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 20 m the degree of imperviousness change in the most relevant categories of sealing change (unchanged no sealing, new cover, loss of cover, unchanged sealed, increased sealing, decreased sealing) for the period 2006-2012 and fully aligned with the CORINE Land Cover update cycle.
title: Imperviousness Classified Change 2006-2012 (raster 20 m), Europe

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2023 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2023 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2019 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2019 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2021 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2021 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2017 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2017 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2018 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2018 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2020 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2020 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 10 m a basic land cover classification with two thematic classes (herbaceous / non-herbaceous) for the 2022 reference year.
title: Herbaceous cover 2022 (raster 10 m), Europe, yearly

description: Provides at pan-European level in the spatial resolution of 20 m information on the dominant leaf type (broadleaved or coniferous) for the 2015 reference year.
title: Dominant Leaf Type 2015 (raster 20 m), Europe, 3-yearly
